channel.title: ChArM's Scripts =D
channel.description:
[center][b]Scripts[/b][/center]
[center]~SuPaFletcher~[/center]
[center][code]{==============================================================================] [ ----------------- ] [ ~SuPaFletcher~ ] [ ----------- ] [ By: ] [ ChArMz ] [ --------------- ] [ Version 2.00 ] [ --------------- ] [ ] [ Features: ] [ ~PlayerManager ] [ ~Randoms ] [ ~AntiBan ] [ ~Progress Report ] [ ] [ Description: ] [ A autofletcher that cuts any log into bows, and then strings them. ] [ ] [ Directions: ] [ (1) Start in Varrock West Bank. ] [ (2) Set the Runescape brightness to V-bright. ] [ (3) SCAR version 2.0.3 needed. ] [ (4) Setup lines 41-45. ] [ (5) Have knife in first invertory spot. ] [ (6) Have logs in 1st bank spot if cutting them into bows. ] [ (7) Have (U)Bows in 1st bank slot and bowstrings in 2nd if Stringing. ] [==============================================================================}[/code]
Progress Report: [code]<============== Progress Report ===============> SuPaFletcher v1.25 By: ChArMz Worked for 33 Minutes and 47 Seconds Strung 644 Bows. Gained 59248 Fletching Exp. <============== Progress Report ===============>[/code]
~SuPaHeater~
[code]{==============================================================================] [ ----------------- ] [ ~SuPaHeAtEr~ ] [ ----------- ] [ By: ] [ ChArMz ] [ -------------- ] [ Version 2.00 ] [ -------------- ] [ ] [ Version History: ] [ ~v1.0 First Release ] [ ~v1.25 Minor Fixes ] [ ~v1.50 Redid the script, Made it overall better ] [ ~v2.00 Made it faster, works good now ] [ ] [ Features: ] [ ~PlayerManager ] [ ~Randoms ] [ ~AntiBan ] [ ~Progress Report ] [ ] [ Description: ] [ Superheats any ore into any bar. ] [ ] [ Directions: ] [ (1) Start in Varrock West Bank. ] [ (2) Set the Runescape brightness to V-bright. ] [ (3) SCAR version 2.0.3 needed. ] [ (4) Setup lines 45-49. ] [ (4) Put Nature Runes in last inventory slot. ] [ (5) Wield Fire Staff, and have a full Inv of the ores you want to make. ] [ (6) Put the main ore in the first bank slot, coal in second. ] [==============================================================================}[/code]
Progress Report: [code]<============== Progress Report ===============> ~SuPaHeater~ v1.75 By: ChArMz Worked for 1 Hours, 26 Minutes and 30 Seconds SuperHeated 555 bars. (Rune Bars) Gained 27750 smithing exp. Gained 29415 magic exp. <============== Progress Report ===============> [/code]
[center]~SuPaSmelter~[/center]
[code]{==============================================================================] [ ----------------- ] [ ~SuPaSmelter~ ] [ ----------- ] [ By: ] [ ChArMz ] [ ] [ -------------- ] [ Version 1.0 ] [ -------------- ] [ ] [ Version History: ] [ ~v1.0 - First Release ] [ ] [ Description: ] [ Smelts bars, or cannonballs at Al-Kharid furnace. ] [ ] [ Directions: ] [ (1) Start in Al-Kharid bank. ] [ (2) Set the Runescape brightness to V-bright. ] [ (3) SCAR version 2.0.3 needed. ] [ (4) Setup lines 39-42. ] [ (4) Put ore in first bank slot, and coal in second. ] [ (5) If making cannonballs, place steel bars in first back slot. ] [==============================================================================}[/code]
Progress Report: [code]<==========Al-Kharid Smelter==========> Worked for 2 Hours, 1 Minutes and 6 Seconds . Smelted 882 bars. Gained 5733 experience. <======================================>
/~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\ | SRL Randoms Report | | www.villavu.com/forums | |~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~| | Talking Random[s] : 3 | | Dwarfs[s] Solved : 1 | | OldMen Solved : 2 | | New Box[s] Solved : 1 | | Death[s]: 3 |- Hmm?..I never died. \~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~/[/code]
~SuPaTanner~
[code]{==============================================================================] [ ----------------- ] [ ~SuPaTanner~ ] [ ----------- ] [ By: ] [ ChArMz ] [ ] [ -------------- ] [ Version 1.0 ] [ -------------- ] [ ] [ Version History: ] [ ~v1.0 - First Release ] [ ] [ Description: ] [ Tans any hide at Al-Kharid. ] [ ] [ Directions: ] [ (1) Start in Al-Kharid bank. ] [ (2) Set the Runescape brightness to V-bright. ] [ (3) SCAR version 2.0.3 needed. ] [ (4) Setup lines 41-44. ] [ (4) Put hides in first bank slot. ] [ (5) Have money in first invertory spot. ] [==============================================================================}[/code][/center]
NOTE: Please post all problems and progress reprorts.
I Am Currently Making: Ghost Place Smelter(Members) - 90% Done =D Varrock West Yew Chopper - About 30% Done
*Also, Fixing all scripts, to make them perfect :P
Have Fun :D
~ChArMz
